data.name: Let's Ruin It With Babies
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Channing is a young woman with a perfect rockstar life – a beautiful house, a dream job running a mobile karaoke bar, and a well-meaning husband intent on ruining it all by knocking her up.

Directed by: Kestrin Pantera
Produced by: Yelena Rachitsky, Kestrin Pantera, Scott Watson
Starring: Kestrin Pantera, Jonathan Grubb, Sam Friedman, Ria Bellafiore, Rebecca Larsen, Patrick Daniel

data.short_description: Channing is a young woman with a perfect rockstar life – a beautiful house, a dream job running a mobile karaoke bar, and a well-meaning husband intent on ruining it all by knocking her up.
data.reviews:
“...honest, convincing, and just plain adorable.”
Los Angeles Times

“Charming”
The Village Voice

“Must Watch”
Marie Claire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
